> 
> Hook still clenched his shoulder, it must be inactive now, he 
thought to
> himself. He looked back up, at the aliens, "You have to talk to my 
l..."
> he was cut off by Havotron exiting. He smiled to himself. "Raisle 
was
> it? Meet....Havotron." Hook declared gloriosly.
> 
> Apeface heard the order from behind the aliens, and grunted, "Sure, 
me
> always get exciting jobs." He said sarcastically, as he began to 
swagger
> towards the ship, ignoring everything that was happening.
> 
> 
_____________________________________________________________________
> 
> Nightmare nodded, then saluted to his leader, as he took off, as he
> walked towards the bridge. Jagged was all to curious of his new mode
> however, and was busy sharpening his claws against each other, as 
they
> made a violent noise, of rasor sharp metal on metal.
> 

::LONG HAUL::

    Long Haul, satisfied that his work with Jagged and Nightmare was 
complete, went outside to finish work on the bridge. He remebered his 
days with Megatron on Earth. He snorted with contempt. His memories 
were a mixture of good and bad. He missed squishing humans and the 
pathertic lifeforms that made up the planet.
    Silently fuming to himself, he put more effort into the work he 
was doing.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
